{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Blitzz |model=BWA611B |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/25/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=ARM804 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4ARM804 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8500;88W8500-BAN, FB31531.1, 0327 E1P, Taiwan H; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV800BT-70EC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W981616BH-7 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8500;88W8500-BAN, FB31531.1, 0327 E1P, Taiwan H; |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ, FC19641.1, 0336 B0P, Taiwan; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Blitzz |default_ssid_regex=^Blitzz$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:E0:98 |oui_eth=00:E0:98 |default_ch= }} "M010-804M+-A20" is silkscreened on the board.
The included power supply is a '''unbranded''' MW48-1200800 (12V, 800mA).
